member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ILinking.GetReferencingArtifacts(System.String[],Microsoft.TeamFoundation.LinkFilter[])
member.summary: Retrieves an array of artifact objects that reference or link to one or more of the input artifact URIs, restricted by the criteria in the filters parameter.
member.returns: An array of artifact objects that reference or link to one or more of the input artifact URIs, restricted to the criteria in the filters parameter
member.param: Filters that limit the return values to those that meet the filter's criteria.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ILinkingConsumer
member.summary: Defines a method to retrieve a list of artifact objects that reference or link to one or more of the artifacts identified in an input list of artifact URIs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ILinkingConsumer.GetReferencingArtifacts(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns an array of all objects that reference or link to one or more of the input s.
member.returns: The return value is an array of all objects that reference or link to one or more of the input s.
member.param: Array of artifact IDs in URI format.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ILinkingProvider
member.summary: Defines a method that enables a caller to navigate to and display an without any knowledge of the or the ’s type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ILinkingProvider.GetArtifacts(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns an array of artifact objects that complies with the Team Foundation Generic Artifact Display Schema.
member.returns: An array of artifact objects that complies with the Team Foundation Generic Artifact Display Schema (GAS).When an artifact for which an ID appears in the artifactUris cannot be returned, its corresponding element in the returned artifact array is set to null.
